films.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
films.Writer: James Gunn, Dan Abnett (based on the Marvel comics by), Andy Lanning (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Englehart (Star-Lord created by), Steve Gan (Star-Lord created by), Jim Starlin (Gamora and Drax created by), Stan Lee (Groot created by), Larry Lieber (Groot created by), Jack Kirby (Groot created by), Bill Mantlo (Rocket Raccoon created by), Keith Giffen (Rocket Raccoon created by), Steve Gerber (Howard the Duck created by), Val Mayerik (Howard the Duck created by)
films.Actors: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel
films.Plot: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.
films.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 15 wins & 57 nominations.

films.Title: Fight Club
films.Actors: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
films.Plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
films.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 37 nominations.
films.Production: Art Linson Productions, Fox 2000 Pictures, Taurus Film, New Regency Pictures

films.Title: Requiem for a Dream
films.Writer: Hubert Selby Jr. (based on the book by), Hubert Selby Jr. (screenplay), Darren Aronofsky (screenplay)
films.Actors: Ellen Burstyn, Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, Marlon Wayans
films.Plot: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.
films.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 37 wins & 69 nominations.
films.Production: Thousand Words, Industry Entertainment, Truth and Soul Pictures, Bandeira Entertainment, Requiem for a Dream LLC, Artisan Entertainment, Protozoa Pictures, Sibling Productions

films.Title: Joker
films.Writer: Todd Phillips, Scott Silver, Bob Kane (based on characters created by), Bill Finger (based on characters created by), Jerry Robinson (based on characters created by)
films.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz, Frances Conroy
films.Plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
films.Production: Bron Studios, Creative Wealth Media Finance, DC Comics
